A '''blaze rod''' is an [[item]] obtained from [[blaze]]s. It is required to [[craft]] [[brewing stand]]s and fuel them in a [[Blaze Powder|powdered form]], which is also required to craft [[eyes of ender]].

=== Mob loot ===

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage}}

=== Fuel ===
When used in a [[furnace]], a blaze rod lasts 120 seconds (12 items).

== Trivia ==
* As part of an official collaboration, blaze rods are included in a free add-on for the roleplaying game {{wikipedia|Dungeons & Dragons|''Dungeons and Dragons''}}.<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/content/dam/games/minecraft/software/Minecraft-Monstrous-Compendium.pdf</ref> In the game, they are worth 100 gold pieces, create light, and can be broken to create an explosion.
